comments.creator: Albrecht@web.de
comments.author: Albrecht@web.de
comments.text: Address book should have fields to work directly on the chosen contact similar like the bookmarks manager of firefox. It should work without using double clicks. To change between the contacts has to be as simple as possible. So you could fill up and change your contact details much more faster.
comments.raw_text: Address book should have fields to work directly on the chosen contact similar like the bookmarks manager of firefox. It should work without using double clicks. To change between the contacts has to be as simple as possible. So you could fill up and change your contact details much more faster.

comments.text:
(In reply to nero75 from comment #0)
This is an enhancement and by accident, I came across the following link: http://breakingtheegg.tumblr.com/post/11614333654/new-address-book-mockup

comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Ludovic Hirlimann [:Usul] from comment #2)
> Hashem is it a duplicate ?

I don't think so. There are many new address book bugs which are enhancements but none of them is asking for this functionality.
